//json comments: Things procceded with // are the instructions on how to update the corresponding values in the okta block
//saml_endpoint: Set based on the saml endpoint in your okta
//login_endpoint: Set based on the saml endpoint in your okta
//saml_pipe: Change the path to a local directory on your file path where you want to save the saml token, end with '/samlPipe' and create a file with name 'samlPipe'
